ygData.subject: Threatening
ygData.msgSnippet: Any evil races out there who s successfully changed their faction with the human guards around Freeport? I ve been killing orcs left and right but guards and
ygData.messageBody:
Any evil races out there who's successfully changed their faction with the human guards around Freeport? I've been killing orcs left and right but guards and innkeeps still threatening to me.

I was hopping to at least be to a point where I can walk in and hope on boat if I needed to. Of course I'd probably have to deal with guards in other continents.

Any ideas?
---
Numok lvl 12 Ogre Warrior
